long_description: Keep your beverages and tasty food cold and fresh on the way to your campsite or backyard barbecue in the 30 qt. Coleman Performance cooler. Sturdy design lets you use the cooler as a seat without worrying about collapsing the top. Hinged lid closes securely and includes 2 cup holders on top; lid opens easily with 1 hand. Coleman Performance cooler has a swing-top bail handle for easy carrying.
short_description: Keep your beverages and tasty food cold and fresh on the way to your campsite or backyard barbecue in the 30 qt. Coleman Performance cooler.
